questions_and_answers.question: Do you have existing blog content to migrate, or is this a fresh start?
questions_and_answers.why: Determines if we need migration scripts and content transformation tools

questions_and_answers.question: What's your expected publishing frequency and workflow?
questions_and_answers.why: Helps design content management and preview systems

questions_and_answers.question: Is this a single-author blog or will you have guest contributors?
questions_and_answers.why: Determines author management and attribution systems

questions_and_answers.question: How do you plan to handle image storage and optimization?
questions_and_answers.why: Affects CDN strategy, storage costs, and build performance

questions_and_answers.question: Do you need contact forms, newsletter signup, or other interactive features?
questions_and_answers.why: Determines backend requirements and third-party integrations
questions_and_answers.answer: No dynamic features, mailto link for contact

questions_and_answers.question: What level of code syntax highlighting do you need?
questions_and_answers.why: Affects choice between basic (highlight.js) vs advanced (Shiki) highlighters
questions_and_answers.answer: Advanced code blocks (line numbers, highlighting, diff, copy button)

questions_and_answers.question: Do you have existing brand assets (fonts, colors, logo)?
questions_and_answers.why: Determines if we're working from scratch or implementing existing brand

questions_and_answers.question: What's your priority: accessibility compliance or cutting-edge animations?
questions_and_answers.why: Neo-brutalist designs can conflict with accessibility if not carefully balanced

questions_and_answers.question: What analytics depth do you need (page views only vs detailed user journeys)?
questions_and_answers.why: Affects choice between simple Vercel Analytics vs Google Analytics

questions_and_answers.question: Do you need cookie consent management or GDPR compliance features?
questions_and_answers.why: Determines if we need cookie banners and consent management

questions_and_answers.question: Do you have a custom domain, or should we use Vercel's free domain initially?
questions_and_answers.why: Affects deployment configuration and DNS setup requirements

questions_and_answers.question: What's your preferred backup/disaster recovery strategy?
questions_and_answers.why: Determines if we need automated backups or rely on Git history

key_decisions_summary: Fresh start with no content migration needed
Single-author blog with weekly publishing cadence
GitHub repository for content and image storage (2 images per post)
No dynamic backend features (mailto for contact only)
Advanced code syntax highlighting with Shiki
Space Grotesk font family (free, self-hosted via next/font/google)
Simple analytics via Vercel Analytics (privacy-friendly, no cookies)
Git-based backup strategy (no separate backup system)
